article_title: Take a Bite Out of Your Taxes
article_text:
Take a Bite Out of Your Taxes



October 21, 2013 By Josephine McMullen October 21, 2013

article_metadata.DESCRIPTION: It's hard to believe that we're almost midway through the final quarter of 2013. It’s easy to forget year-end tax planning, but this is the time that managing tax liabilities and planning for the year ahead should be on everyone's mind.
article_metadata.AUTHOR: Greenville Business Magazine

article_summary: Take a Bite Out of Your TaxesOctober 21, 2013 By Josephine McMullen October 21, 2013
